original_title: Paolo Rossi: A Champion is a Dreamer Who Never Gives Up
overview: On July 11, 1982, Italy defeated West Germany 3-1 and unexpectedly won the World Cup. Paolo Rossi, better known as Pablito, described by Pele and Maradona as the greatest champion in football history, guided Italy towards the title. The fascinating parable of Paolo Rossi's life story, which culminated in the realization of his greatest dream: to become a world champion.
title: Paolo Rossi: A Champion is a Dreamer Who Never Gives Up
